name: ex-error
description: Extendible error wrapper for NodeJS and browser
author: Reyhan Sofian <computecoholic@gmail.com>

scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module":"commonjs"}' nyc mocha -r ts-node/register -r source-map-support/register src/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es6
scripts.build:cjs: mkdir -p lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src/index.ts -o lib/index.js --extensions '.ts' --ignore src/tests
scripts.build:es6: mkdir -p es6 && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es6 babel src/index.ts -o es6/index.js --extensions '.ts' --ignore src/tests
